website_summaries.verdict: Great for hanging larger, heavier custom doors. The rail (8 feet) is a solid piece of heavy-duty steel, and the instructional video makes installation easier.
pros: Bar is a solid 8-foot length of steel
Can support very heavy doors with ease
cons: Some complaints about the quality of the lag bolts
Additional hardware may be needed to stabilize bottom tracks
Rail can develop a bend before installation

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price point
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price point. Pretty easy to install but definitely need two people to install. Must be level for sure! All the hardware needed are included in the kit. I had to use a header for the rail because the door headers and studs were not going to line up. Luckily there was a house in our neighborhood being built was the same plan so I was able to see the inside layout to make the final decision. The door is very large at 42" wide and 100" tall so needed the extra support anyway plus I think the header finishes the look we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd hardware kit from Industrial By Design. Installed on my 2nd barn door in my new house. It is great hardware and the customer service is top notch. I wish all companies were as customer driven as these folks are!! Everyone that sees my 2 barn doors loves the look of the hardware that I used. Look no further, this is an excellent product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Grass Carp

customer_reviews.title: This kit is perfect for a heavy barn door
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for a heavy barn door. It arrived in 2 days. The instructions were great, but the installation video was awesome to watch before assembly. It explained and showed how to put it together and install perfectly. Super great quality!!! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video before reading the instruction, it fills any questions you might have.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great instructional video. This was my first barn door install and everything worked perfectly. I installed another one a week after. No surprises, this kit is well put together. Rolls extremely well, well packaged. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra 30-40$ from the cheap kits and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Helms

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service, easy to follow installation video!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were super easy to follow and their customer service is fantastic! Our studs were not the same width as the predrilled holes in the rail and the seller offered great advice to add a header board and then mount the rail to it. See photo for finished product! The finish is a perfect matte black. Door, handle, and latch not included in package but inexpensive to buy separately (found at Lowes).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shemwell

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy.. Loved the quality
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy..Loved the quality..Project to replace two bi-fold doors in a 52" door opening. Actual door was 54" x 7' and made out of #2 wood for weight purposes. Most difficult task was making the door because the Hardware Kit was a breeze. Had to drill new holes due to our slanted roofs/walls.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used the materials we ordered and made me a beautiful door. We had already bought one from Lowe's but when he seen yours online be knew it would be better suited for what we needed. I love my door & so do all our friends. We are thankful to cross one project off of our list. We will recommend this product to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: argirl

customer_reviews.title: Just what the barn door needed. . .
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time, in perfect condition, with great instructions (both written and video). Couldn't be happier with the product or the end result. HIGHLY recommend this product - it works smoothly and is exactly what we needed for our 4' wide x 8' tall door to function safely.
customer_reviews.author: 5599sh

customer_reviews.title: Well built kit.
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to install and the hardware fits together well. The tolerances of the construction are much better than I found with another vendor. Very happy with this barn door hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Diddley

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!.... but some advice------
customer_reviews.text: Word of caution..... First this is a great kit and I love it. High quality all the way around. My only install advice is to be careful with how much pressure you apply by tightening up the lag bolts.... the reason being is the spacer can cave into your drywall. Just pay attention as you thread your bolt in. You will not need it torqued down like crazy. Just my 2 cents If you're using a header board (which I did not need) you prob won't have any issues My door dimensions were 9' 5" x 43.5" Great hardware kit 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best barndoor rail system out there
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best barndoor rail system out there. Quality is exceptional. Rail system went together so easy when hanging my custom made 52" door. Excellent instructions. Awesome packaging. I've already purchased a second system!
customer_reviews.author: D. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Track is terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty track really worked well with the barn door my husband build. 150 pounds and working great!
customer_reviews.author: dawslp

customer_reviews.title: You need this kit as its bar is one piece 8 feet long.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made kit with heavy duty hardware. The instructions are all visual and a lttle small in print to be clear but you can use them. They have an instructional video on YT that clarifies a lot and is better than the printed instructions. A big plus is the one piece bar that the wheels ride on. It is heavy duty and would be more than adequate for this use. One piece construction provides a lot of strength.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stanley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality hardware set at a great price and very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality hardware set at a great price and very easy to assemble. It's decorative and stylish for my daughters closet door. Just love the look
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: ... came damaged and missing parts otherwise it was a good sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The package came damaged and missing parts otherwise it was a good sturdy product. Edit: I sent an email asking where I could find the missing parts to purchase and they immediately sent me my missing parts and gave me a partial refund for the damaged box (which wasn't their fault). After a few months of use the door is still working great and rolling perfectly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Barn Door Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Hardware was received quickly. Excellent quality. Ease to install = excellent! Plus they provided an installation video! Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product five stars in all categories because the contractor I hired to place the door did not have any issues with it. The door is custom made and the manufacturer suggested that the barn door have a "header" which makes the hardware easier to place. Without the header, the hardware may not line up with the home's studs. Our door is 90 lbs and it was imperative that it hung without compromising the structure of the walls. The hardware worked perfectly with the header and door.
customer_reviews.author: choco41yum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, especially for the price. Quiet and very smooth. Easy installation (watch provided video link for a super easy run down). Will be purchasing again for other clients as the demand warrants.
customer_reviews.author: matthew kolysko

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get this rail in for our Barn Door to be added to our Master bathroom. Super sturdy and heavy duty is what we loved. Our rail was bent at the very end causing the door to roll back and not stay shut. This was frausterating BUT we ended up moving the stop even further out so the door would stay shut. If you don't stand at the back of the door you can't tell the uneven part and the opening to the door but we are still happy. It looks great. We have waited 2 years to put a barn door on.
customer_reviews.author: Natosha Elliott

customer_reviews.title: We were very impressed with the quality of this product ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the quality of this product. The video that is available on their website was very helpful. It is much less expensive to buy this hardware and make your own door. You don't have to be a professional carpenter either because it is a "rustic" barn door, right? ;) We needed a custom size door and this worked perfectly. We would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 for my custom door
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly and easy and simple assembly. I just installed my second 8 foot barn door kit, and I still give this 5 star, but one recommendation for mounting your door is when you drill the holes for the door you are mounting, drill the holes larger than the bolt being used, and drill a small hole in between the bolts on the roller to secure a set screw. The reason is, like in my case, the door will be sliding closed onto a wall, and not all walls are perfectly plumb, so by drilling the holes larger, it will give you some adjustment to your door, and the set screw will secure your door when you tighten it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Barn Doors
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were a bit lacking, but the product is sturdy. I built an enormous barn door that is supported by this mounting kit. The pre-drilled holes on the wall mounting bar only work if your house was perfectly framed. If you are wall studs are off by an inch or two, then you will have a problem. The rollers are smooth and silent. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Barn door rails
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. High quality rollers. Quality paint. It's exactly what I had in mind. Installation went smoothly. I am very proud of my end result.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! And looks wonderful! Was easy to install and rolls very smooth. Great addition to my den!
customer_reviews.author: jewelz55

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend This Barn Door Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third hardware kit we have ordered from Industrial By Design. They are great!! I would not buy from any other company! I learned about Industrial By Design from a co-worker. She and her sister both have used these kits and were very pleased. They were right! We are extremely pleased with all three kits. They are very well built. Ships really fast. The video tells you exactly how to install the hardware. I highly recommended this company and their products!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Better than expected!!! Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install with 2 people as long as you follow the instructions and measure, measure, measure! One of the easiest and most satisfying projects we have done. We were trying to cover our furnace/water heater space. Ended up nail gunning some slats of wood we picked out individually at Home Depot to a piece of USB board so we could make it look rustic. It was lighter (and cheaper) than a real door which was nice for the install. Great product for the price. Love the different sizes it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation with Quality Materials
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price of this hardware and the parts are made of good quality materials. The product was boxed well and well protected. The hardest part was putting the header up to mount it, but once that was done the installation of the hardware was a snap. Watched the video that they sent, but it was so easy even without watching. The sliding is silky smooth (too smooth as our cats are able to push the door aside) and door is nice and sturdy. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: This came in a huge long box. I was thinking it was going to come in a million different pieces. But it was one long piece along with the separate attachments. It was very easy to install. Just make sure you have at least two people to install it as the length makes it hard for one. But if you have two people it is super easy. We got it up along with the door that we built ourselves in less then a half hour. That's awesome in my life as we have a very busy and hectic life. If you are looking for a sliding barn door hardware this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: A.E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Door glides very smoothly and the hardware is very sturdy. We had never mounted a barn door before, so we went online and watched the video. For novices, we had no problem installing. Would definitely purchase again. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: easy enough to install (especially since this was the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Works slick, easy enough to install (especially since this was the second door I built and installed the hardware on), about half price as same thing at big box store. I personally do not like having to cut channel in bottom of door for the anti-sway gadget; might be easy if I had right tool but a pain with only skill saw--for second door I ordered a separate device that screws into wall trim, much better. But the hanging hardware itself is substantial, works well, quiet and easy rolling.
customer_reviews.author: ronc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...  Loved it..  Works amazing..  Solid Unit...
customer_reviews.text: I built my own barn door... Used this product because the reviews said it was a solid unit and it functioned very well.. It is an awesome unit, however when I made my own door so I couldn't router out the bottom for the glide... I used one of those nice floor door stops on the front side of the door and the actual glide that you would use when you if you routed out the center of the bottom of the door on the wall side to help guide the door and keep it in place worked well.. And looks awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as stated, easy to install, and worked to perfection. I used it for a shed door I made from cedar. It was too heavy for hinges. This solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hardware. Be aware that they state you can have a 2” door without a header, but you have to subtract your door trim/casing. I’m sure it would work with a 2” doorway that was not framed. In my case the trim+door was too much, and I had to go back and add a 3/4 (1”) header. Turned out great though. Watch the video- way more helpful Than the print instructions!
customer_reviews.author: KillitAndGrillit

customer_reviews.title: It has a better powdercoat finish than the other two and the packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different barn door kits from two different companies before I came across this kit. It has a better powdercoat finish than the other two and the packaging came in one piece! Ha! The others that I ordered came to my door destroyed and missing most of the pieces. Great product, nice smooth rolling action. It slides open and closed like it should. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have asked for a better product! Professional installation used but it was worth it. Guide on the bottom is great, had bought a different one originally but ended up using the one that came with the kit
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Inexpensive Barn Door Hardware!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hardware kit. It has a full 8' length rail. It is heavy duty and well made. The extra hangers are awesome too. Best of all, the price is incredible. We priced the hardware locally and online, no one could beat their price. Would definitely recommend. We have 3 rails/hardware kits and 3 sets of extra hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Super d duper
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Very smooth! Looked similar to ones at home improvement store for 170 dollars. One thing to note though the holes you attach the rail with are 18 inches apart meaning if ou don’t have studs in the wall at hat exact distance you have to use a backer board so the screws have something to grip on. I got one already stained and finished at a home improvement store for about 15 dollars and it worked fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Vwking2000

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install...
customer_reviews.text: Wes, Thanks for reaching out. Your product was fantastic....clear and easy to follow instructions. I was able to install it in about 10 minutes by myself. I have recommended your product to everyone who has seen my completed barn door project. BTW, the door was made from scratch by my daughters, wife, and I. I am actually about to purchase the rail hardware for a cabinet that I am building now. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time. Product was fairly easy to install, comes with an email from manufacturer with a video of installation instructions which was a bonus. Very well made, heavy duty as described. Door glides along rail very smoothly, only need to barely coax it and it slides down to stopper on it's own. The only additional products we bought were a glide to install on the floor so door stays flush with wall, a handle for exterior, and a puck for interior. Very pleases with product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easily mounted and installed. The holes are perfectly aligned with the normal 16' center stud pattern so it is easy to put it where it needs to go. It works so well, that the door slides open on its own due to it being slightly unlevel (my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, Looks great, Getting nothing but compliments. The videos and instructions made me a lot more confident to install. The hardest part about installing was making sure I found the right studs. Make sure you can find your studs 16" apart. I did have to cut off 2 inches on one side to hit the 16" studs. My doorway is right against the wall. Measure carefully, followed instructions and everything came out perfectly aligned.
customer_reviews.author: DGwha

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Top-quality product with great video instructions. First time to hang a barn door and it went smoothly. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Better deal then everywhere else!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sliding barn door look! We looked everywhere for the hardware and OMG it was so expensive in stores! We decided to try this one and love it! You will need 3 or 4 ppl for install though. It’s heavy and requires long periods of standing and holding the top track bar. Solid material and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: This "Barn Door System" is perfect for my project
customer_reviews.text: Hardware was complete, "Heavy Duty" and works well - I just added the lock. You will notice that I sloped the track down to the left. When I unlock the door, the door stays open to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pefect
customer_reviews.text: Kids can finally kick me out of the room so they can watch their movies in peace.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Whoop Whoop!!! It’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. I have several barn doors that I’ve hung in my house and hands down this 8’ rail system is the best. It’s important with a heavy barn door to have one solid rail for easy sliding and this one goes the trick! Great quality product! I will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love the products!
customer_reviews.text: I made two barn door shutters for a window opening. Each one was 23 x 62 inches. Because I had two doors, I ordered the additional hanger kit. All went well, except I had to make my own guides for the bottom of the doors. The hardware and rail are beefy and sturdy as well as attractive. I am very pleased with the end result and with the product.
customer_reviews.author: cjc

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just hung my door today. Mine is outside. Description states for indoor/outdoor use so I'll report back if it doesn't hold up well in the elements. Seems really stout. I believe it will last. Hanging a door that weighs about 150 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, heavy duty and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t usually write reviews; but I was going back and forth on what sliding kit to use and decided on this one. It was a great choice! The rollers are incredibly quiet and the track is nice and sturdy. I used this for a 3.5’ x 9’ white oak door and it holds it without a question. 10/10 would recommend and 10/10 will order in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rail system. my bolts that attach rollers were a little short (even the longer ones) and they seemed like soft metal but worked out great and looks are awsome.
customer_reviews.author: etorongeau

customer_reviews.title: STRONG AND GOOD LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: This hardware is quality-made and strong. I used it to hang a very heavy barn door made from actual antique barn wood. The hardwood supports the door with no problem and it glides like a hot knife through butter. I am especially pleased that the 8 foot piece is all one piece. I absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, nothing cheap about it. Saw the same one at Costco for way more $$
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: My barn door looks amazing. I love it
customer_reviews.text: My barn door looks amazing. I love it. We made some modifications because I wasn't hanging an "actual" door which tends to be thicker. I needed something "thinner", so I had to trade out the bolts because they were designed for a thicker door. But otherwise, it was super duper easy to hang and put up. Love the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the box in ok shape but was taped back together. The packaging was made out of two half pieces of cardboard taped back together. I did t open it for about a month when I was ready to start the project and noticed the kit only had one of the roller tracks. Please send me the other track I am not able to contact customer service through the app. Please contact me and help :) Send me the part and I’ll write a 5 star review. The set actually looks great! The bar is straight, looks very strong, and the finish is great. Thank you in advance
customer_reviews.author: Randy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Quality was good. Packaging was OK
customer_reviews.text: Directions were a bit fuzzy, even after reviewing the video several times. Quality was good. Packaging was OK, slight bend to the bar from shipper. I'd buy again
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Murray,III

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I just got around to using this in a new house we are building. Easy to install with easy to follow instructions. The exact look we wanted. The door glides effortlessly with one finger to open or close. One of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research on barn door hardware before purchasing this particular product. I chose this one because the top rail is all one piece, not two pieces and based on other reviews and research I discovered that getting two pieces for the track is not sturdy enough to hold a heavy door. I love the industrial look and everyone who comes over loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this hardware because it was almost $100 less than a similar item at a big box store. My biggest fear was that it would be cheaply made from inferior (thin) steel. Was I ever pleasantly surprised! The brackets and rail are made of heavy-duty 1/4" rolled steel. My door is 96" x 45". The nylon rollers are very sturdy and the door rolls with little effort and noise. This was my first barn door and the installation video was informative and easy to follow. Industrial by Design did an excellent job with this product - I definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Nice product to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the basement to separate Laundry area from living space. Glad I went with one piece rail as the door I built was pretty heavy. Rolls quiet and smooth... ordered a roller wheel door stay separate and built a makeshift pipe handle... would be great if the roller wheel and a matching handle were included or offered in the kit as an all in one solution. But in all good product... would buy again and probably will since wife now wants more of these types of doors in the house.
customer_reviews.author: ANDT8

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Price, Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Heavy duty, easy rollers, and clean looking finish. The only thing I wish was that they had 2” Spacers and bolts instead of just the 1 3/8” or 1 3/4”. I added a 1x8 header and painted to match wall color, which ended up looking really good. Other than that, I love it! I’ll be buying more from this company when I change out our master bedroom double doors for sliding barn doors. Thanks Industrial by Design!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fraction of what the others cost
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and working great. Nice options for different fittings.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer steiner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure how this was going look or install. It had a few good reviews that convinced me. Easy installation, they send you easy instructions and email you link to install video. I used a header plate due to my door being 2" thick then bought longer hanger bolts. This is my first attempt at a barn door. Wife is very happy. Highly recommen this kit. Very smooth and made of high quality. The look is perfect. Don't waste money on more expensive one's. Good luck and thank you industrial by design!
customer_reviews.author: bpl2002

customer_reviews.title: Amazing track
customer_reviews.text: Finally finished the barn door....track is amazing! The door is at least 250#, 7 ft tall, solid walnut. So happy I didn’t let anyone talk me into the $400.00 track that I was told was the only thing that would hold the door. It’s simple and beautiful which is exactly what I wanted. Would absolutely recommend that anyone hanging a barn door use this track and save their money. When the track was delivered the box was open and the seller immediately responded, sent me all the information on what I should have along with instructions and was a pleasure to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this well made product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LEGIT! I was looking at a similar item at the hardware store and it was way more expensive. I thought this was going to be cheap, but it is made of really beefy steel and is well made. I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Dustan Balkcom

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and nicely designed. Simple to install and rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials and nicely designed. Simple to install and rolls smoothly, quietly. Customer service was even better. Box was damaged in shipment and one of the parts was missing. The company had already emailed an installation guide so I responded to that email with a request for the part. I got a reply within minutes that included the tracking info! Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: J. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and this is very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and this is very well made. We were disappointed that the set spots to mount it to the wall did not match up with where our studs were. We had to mount a piece of wood to the wall to mount this to. It wasn’t the look we were going for but we’re living with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This door kit saved me a ton of money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super easy to install, glides like butter. A door company quoted me several thousand dollars for one of these. Built this with my son for under $300 including the hardware. The installation video was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit end of June but never opened the package. Tonight I started to install the hardware only to realize there were several items not in the box. I am missing one wheel, the door stops that stop the door before it runs off the track, the piece that goes at the bottom of the door to hold it tight to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made hardware and easy unstallation process. Written and website directions pretty good; leaves out a few things that you must figure out on your own (eg, depth and width of notch on door bottom). Really fair price for the kit; so many other kit prices are ridiculously high. Since my house had metal studs in a few places, I used 1/4 in. toggle bolts instead of supplied screws to hold rail and it worked fine. If I need another, I would buy this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a daily deal on Amazon just in time for our bathroom reno. We have been very pleased with it. Great directions, made very well, and our barn door slides so smoothly. Everyone is impressed with our new bathroom barn door.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Value
customer_reviews.text: I am equally impressed by the quality of this product, the price, and the service. My contractor even noted that the quality was better than found in the high end lumber store, at half the price. The 8' runner piece without a joint in the middle looks clean and feels substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hardware
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Every piece is solid and well-made. The one-piece 8-foot track and nylon wheels ensure that it rolls very quietly. Installation was easy (I am an experienced carpenter) and it looks great. I was missing one piece of hardware in the packaging but I contacted the seller - he emailed me about a week after I received the product to ask what I thought of the product, so I replied that a piece was missing. A few days later, I had the missing piece in hand. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Morton

customer_reviews.title: but after reading the fantastic reviews I was sold
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This product is VERY high quality! I was a little nervous to buy (because it's priced so reasonably, but after reading the fantastic reviews I was sold. It's great quality metal, and the online video tutorial was really helpful. I used a header board behind it. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: KP1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product twice for 2 different barn door installs. Works very well. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: buy this now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried at first to make my own didn't quite work how i wanted it to. So i purchased this one. Delivery was quick. the wheel is super smooth and instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: What an easy project!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had this done in a day!! We priced out buying the wood neccessary for the look we wanted and then we saw this kit with all you needed. And it was cheaper! With easy to follow instructions it was a no brainer. Came out perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Photo is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I like the full rail system as opposed to the two part system. However the photo is deceiving. Why would a picture of a spoked wheel be the lead photo for a non-spoked wheel trolley system? And yes, I ordered the wrong one based on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: DC∆

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hardware! Simple looking, smooth, quiet...it's perfect for what I wanted and priced pretty great too.
customer_reviews.author: Hart & Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Turned out beautifully. Seller's comments were invaluable when installing
customer_reviews.text: Turned out beautifully. Seller's comments were invaluable when installing. We thought our studs would be perfectly spaced, but ended up needing to install a header board to make the door stop where we needed it to. Great hardware and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: soccerbritt

customer_reviews.title: Great very happy with these sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great and very sturdy construction. Almost identical to the one at Lowes for $100 bucks more. Slides very quietly and easy to put up. The holes were exactly 16 apart. The only thing i did not like was that I would of had to route out the bottom of the door for the glide, I did not install that part.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Great rail kit.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and would recommend. Included instruction sheet should be improved but video fills in the few gaps. Great follow up from supplier regarding satisfaction. Now if they could just invent a rail that would work where the framers showed up to work without their tape measures...
customer_reviews.author: DalnHou

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to install. One thing that might be more useful would be to make it clear what minimum sizes between door at roller hardware, as well as track and ceiling are needed, to make building the door to correct size easier.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Love that it's one big piece. Slides perfectly. Bought roller for floor stabilization because I didn't want to cut the door for the ground groove that came with the package. Also bought a handle separately. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morris

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is very nice and heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is very nice and heavy-duty. It looks just like what is pictured and is easy to install with the directions and video link they send. My door is over 100lbs and it holds it no problem. My studs weren't standard distance apart so I just used a header board and it worked great. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Great price and fairly easy to install. The instructions were not very detailed, but the video that was e-mailed to me was very informative. My barn door was made locally and a bit smaller than most doors, so I had to recalculate some vertical distances for the rail height and roller height on the door itself. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Turned out perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this hardware! The instructions looked intimidating but it turned out to be fairly simple! It’s really smooth and very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: No mounting Brackets- issue rectified
customer_reviews.text: Below was my original review. Supplier Not only sent the parts that were missing but also saved me $$$ on my project, thank you so much for taking care of your customers. 10/10 would recomend the supplier but also love the hardware, looks amazing. (Did not come with mounting brackets. Only the rod and rolling wheels. Reached out to customer service to try and work something out).
customer_reviews.author: goose1252

customer_reviews.title: Product met all expectations; however, it might be ...
customer_reviews.text: Product met all expectations; however, it might be worthwhile to include extra spacers for thicker doors and/or thicker door casings. I had to add an additional 1/2" spacer to clear door jamb
customer_reviews.author: NW Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong design with heavy duty rail and rollers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (2) 8' heavy duty sliding barn door hardware sets by Industrial by Design, via Amazon. Product arrived on time, packaged robustly. Installation was a breeze, and the door rolls smoothly and quietly. Good, strong design with heavy duty rail and rollers. They look great. I have a wide door and subsequently realized I needed a rail connector so I contacted Wes from Industrial by Design (via email), who promptly sent me the part at no charge. Excellent product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Gamelin

customer_reviews.title: Might work better with light doors
customer_reviews.text: These work ok. I have pretty heavy barn doors. Every so often they come off of the tracks. I dont use the door very often and am a bit frustrated when I have to put the doors back up (they require two people because of the weight) They look great however.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Door Sliders
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty quality, quite smooth rollers. Very easy to install because the seller will email you a install video that is easy to follow. If you still have questions the seller will walk you through it if needed. Looks great in my bedroom as pass through doors to master bathroom
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and in good condition. Will be buying a second one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Door track was of higher quality than expected. Arrived on time and in good condition. Will be buying a second one for my other project.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and operates smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Quality material. Every piece worked perfectly. Looks nice and operates smoothly. I will be buying more in the very near future. Easy to install with easy to read directions.
customer_reviews.author: michael coffey

customer_reviews.title: looks fantastic and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with ease, looks fantastic and is very sturdy. I would highly recommend this sliding barn door hardware.
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: great hardware
customer_reviews.text: Used this on an inside barn door I installed and made. The door weight right at 100 pounds and the rollers are silky smooth rolling action. Could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt ThompsonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: The seller and product is top-rate.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fantastic seller. I used these for another purpose, actually, and they work as designed and for my purpose also. I highly recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Industrial barn door is amazing. It's solid
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Industrial barn door is amazing. It's solid, easy to install ( according to my contractor) and glides smoothly. It looks durable. My husband made a mirror barn door for our master bath walk-in closet. The door was massive, 48" x 84". I was afraid that the hardware would not be able to stand the weight of this door, but I was wrong. I highly recommend Industrial by Design barn door hardware. It's inexpensive compare to what others are offering but really solid. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Barndoor Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Assembly was quick and simple. Hardware feels very sturdy. Door glides across the rail very smooth and silent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ong

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted a unique barn door that contained 2 doors combined and this has handled the extra weight like a charm. We anchored it to the studs with an extra board but have been very pleased with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dad bod for daaays

customer_reviews.title: Good work guys
customer_reviews.text: I acquired this product about three weeks back and was so impressed with the quality and well thought out design, I ordered another single and double door hardware sets. The alternative bolts to use with a thicker door included with the product were just what I needed. Everything down to the nylon spacers to add to the top of the door to prevent the rollers from popping off the track gives this set an A+ in my book. The video link was very helpful in planning the install. Good work guys!
customer_reviews.author: WILSON C LEVIS JR

product_meta.title: INDUSTRIAL BY DESIGN – 6ft 7in Single Sliding Barn Door Hardware Kit – Ultra Quiet, Designers Choice, All Parts Included, Easy Installation with DIY Video Instructions
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR STRENGTH: Supports 250 pounds comfortably. We take pride in delivering a top quality product with unmatched customer service.
ADDS STYLE TO DECOR: Add an industrial, modern, or rustic look to any space.

6-Foot 7-Inch Rail: Two rails with five pre-drilled holes every 16" on center. Holes begin 7 1/2" on center from each end of the rail. Rail is constructed of solid 1/4" thick steel, finished with our highly durable powder coating. This gets baked onto the steel at 400 degrees and creates the strongest bond possible.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: 100% money back guarantee if you are not satisfied with this product
